title: Tour de France Femmes stage 7: Demi Vollering conquers the Tourmalet and drops Annemiek Van Vleuten
content:
Team SD Worx-Protime rider surges into yellow jersey into final day, with Kasia Niewiadoma second on stage.

Read the full article at Tour de France Femmes stage 7: Demi Vollering conquers the Tourmalet and drops Annemiek Van Vleuten on Velo.
author: sstokes
